---
title: "Curriculum Vitae"
format:
  html:
    page-layout: full
    toc: false
    title-block-banner: false
    title-block-style: plain
---

<section class="cv-hero">
  <div class="cv-hero-inner">
    <div class="cv-hero-text">
      <h1 class="cv-h1">Curriculum Vitae</h1>
      <p class="cv-subtitle">PDF version embedded below for easy reading.</p>
    </div>

    <div class="cv-hero-actions">
      <a class="cv-btn cv-btn-primary" href="./assets/cv.pdf" download>
        Download PDF
      </a>
      <a class="cv-btn cv-btn-ghost" href="./assets/cv.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">
        Open in new tab
      </a>

      <div class="cv-meta">
        <span class="cv-pill" id="last-updated">Last updated: â€”</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

<section class="cv-viewer" aria-label="Embedded CV PDF">
  <div class="cv-frame-wrap">
    <iframe
      class="cv-frame"
      src="./assets/cv.pdf#view=FitH"
      loading="lazy"
      title="Curriculum Vitae PDF">
    </iframe>

    <noscript>
      <p class="cv-noscript">
        JavaScript is disabled. You can
        <a href="./assets/cv.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer">open the CV PDF here</a>.
      </p>
    </noscript>
  </div>
</section>

<script>
(async () => {
  const el = document.getElementById("last-updated");
  const pdfUrl = "./assets/cv.pdf";

  const formatGB = (d) =>
    d.toLocaleDateString("en-GB", { day: "2-digit", month: "long", year: "numeric" });

  try {
    // Prefer the PDF's Last-Modified header (works locally + on most static hosts)
    const res = await fetch(pdfUrl, { method: "HEAD", cache: "no-store" });
    const lm = res.headers.get("last-modified");

    if (lm) {
      const d = new Date(lm);
      if (!Number.isNaN(d.getTime())) {
        el.textContent = `Last updated: ${formatGB(d)}`;
        return;
      }
    }

    // Fallback: do a GET and use response date if available
    const res2 = await fetch(pdfUrl, { method: "GET", cache: "no-store" });
    const dateHeader = res2.headers.get("date");
    if (dateHeader) {
      const d2 = new Date(dateHeader);
      if (!Number.isNaN(d2.getTime())) {
        el.textContent = `Last updated: ${formatGB(d2)} (server date)`;
        return;
      }
    }

    el.textContent = "Last updated: Unavailable";
  } catch (e) {
    el.textContent = "Last updated: Unavailable";
  }
})();
</script>

<style>
/* Tighten Quarto's default title spacing (keeps page feeling premium) */
.quarto-title-block {
  padding-top: .75rem !important;
  padding-bottom: .25rem !important;
  margin-bottom: .25rem !important;
}
.quarto-title-block .title { margin-bottom: .25rem !important; }

/* Theme-ish variables with sensible fallbacks */
:root{
  --cv-bg: var(--bs-body-bg, #fbfbfc);
  --cv-text: var(--bs-body-color, #1f2937);
  --cv-muted: rgba(31, 41, 55, .72);
  --cv-border: rgba(15, 23, 42, .10);
  --cv-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(15, 23, 42, .08);
  --cv-shadow-soft: 0 6px 16px rgba(15, 23, 42, .08);
  --cv-radius: 16px;
}

/* Hero */
.cv-hero {
  width: min(1100px, 92vw);
  margin: .5rem auto 1rem;
  padding: 1rem 1rem 0;
}
.cv-hero-inner{
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 1.4fr 1fr;
  gap: 1rem;
  align-items: center;
  padding: 1.25rem 1.25rem;
  border: 1px solid var(--cv-border);
  border-radius: var(--cv-radius);
  background: var(--cv-bg);
  box-shadow: var(--cv-shadow-soft);
}
.cv-h1{
  margin: 0;
  font-size: clamp(1.6rem, 2.2vw, 2.1rem);
  letter-spacing: -0.02em;
  color: var(--cv-text);
}
.cv-subtitle{
  margin: .35rem 0 0;
  color: var(--cv-muted);
  font-size: 1rem;
}

/* Buttons */
.cv-hero-actions{
  display: grid;
  justify-items: end;
  gap: .5rem;
}
.cv-btn{
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: .5rem;
  padding: .65rem .9rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: 1px solid var(--cv-border);
  text-decoration: none !important;
  font-weight: 650;
  line-height: 1;
  transition: transform .08s ease, box-shadow .12s ease, background .12s ease;
  width: fit-content;
}
.cv-btn:active{ transform: translateY(1px); }

.cv-btn-primary{
  background: rgba(15, 23, 42, .92);
  color: #fff !important;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(15, 23, 42, .18);
  border-color: rgba(15, 23, 42, .18);
}
.cv-btn-primary:hover{ box-shadow: 0 10px 24px rgba(15, 23, 42, .22); }

.cv-btn-ghost{
  background: rgba(15, 23, 42, .03);
  color: var(--cv-text) !important;
}
.cv-btn-ghost:hover{ background: rgba(15, 23, 42, .06); }

/* Meta pill */
.cv-meta{ margin-top: .25rem; }
.cv-pill{
  display: inline-block;
  padding: .35rem .65rem;
  border: 1px solid var(--cv-border);
  border-radius: 999px;
  color: var(--cv-muted);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.55);
  backdrop-filter: blur(6px);
  font-size: .92rem;
}

/* Viewer */
.cv-viewer{
  width: min(1100px, 92vw);
  margin: 0 auto 1.5rem;
}
.cv-frame-wrap{
  border: 1px solid var(--cv-border);
  border-radius: var(--cv-radius);
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: var(--cv-shadow);
  background: #fff;
}
.cv-frame{
  width: 100%;
  height: 84vh;
  border: 0;
  display: block;
}

/* Noscript */
.cv-noscript{
  padding: 1rem;
  margin: 0;
  color: var(--cv-muted);
}

/* Responsive */
@media (max-width: 820px){
  .cv-hero-inner{
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    justify-items: start;
  }
  .cv-hero-actions{
    justify-items: start;
  }
}
</style>
